title: Keen 2 help
content:
Hi Everyone

I need some help with the last level (the level at the top middle when you look at the map). I get to the point where I activate the switch behind the blue door but I cant figure out what to do after that.


Bussy

title: well
content:
Watch the Scrubs walking around the platforms which head up and left. Use the bridge as a safety net to prevent you from falling to a shocking death, and time your jumps carefully.

There's a [url=http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/encyclopedia/maps/maps-k2-lvl16.html]level map here[/url], if you're stumped. :-)[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/posted-pics/XkyRauhKeenLogo.png[/img]

title: Re: well
content: I noticed that if you turned off the lights, the blue/purple dudes with the rayguns aren't quite as quick to shoot but still can be tricky even in the dark.
